content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
We tried Sun Nong Dan's Koh Galbi Jjim Specialty, their signature dish, with an extra addition of cheese and rice rolls. The unique taste was outstanding, and it arrived hot and fresh, satisfying all of us.The dramatic fire explosion and the mesmerizing sight of the cheese melting added a fun element to our dining experience.The tenderness of the meat and the explosion of flavors in the entire dish were truly impressive.Considering we were a group of three, the portion size was just right, and we thoroughly enjoyed every bite. A highly satisfying meal!
